  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(int layer, javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
      Draw a layer of the loaded map 0 -> Non-collisable tiles 1 -> collisable tiles 2 -> destructible tiles
      Parameters:
      layer - should be between 0 and 2, if not return
      pane - the pane where the tiles will be drawn
